entry.title: AI Scientists - LLMs Using Scientific Tools

link.title: AI Scientists - LLMs Using Scientific Tools

entry.content: Excited about this academic collaboration with Anthropic on adding connectors to ToolUniverse to make Claude even more powerful for scientific discovery.
entry.summary: Excited about this academic collaboration with Anthropic on adding connectors to ToolUniverse to make Claude even more powerful for scientific discovery.

entry.title: AI + Validation in Molecular, Organoid, and Clinical Systems

link.title: AI + Validation in Molecular, Organoid, and Clinical Systems

entry.content: Pairing AI with experiments: Our latest PROTON AI generates neurological hypotheses that we validated across molecular, organoid, and clinical systems. [Project website]
entry.summary: Pairing AI with experiments: Our latest PROTON AI generates neurological hypotheses that we validated across molecular, organoid, and clinical systems. [Project website]

entry.title: Greater than the Sum of Its Parts

link.title: Greater than the Sum of Its Parts

entry.content: New preprint on Greater than the Sum of Its Parts: Building Substructure into Protein Encoding Models. [Project website]
entry.summary: New preprint on Greater than the Sum of Its Parts: Building Substructure into Protein Encoding Models. [Project website]

entry.title: Virtual Cells and Instruments
entry.content: We are excited to meet hundreds of researchers attending our AI Virtual Cells and Instruments: A New Era in Drug Discovery and Development workshop at NeurIPS 2025.
entry.summary: We are excited to meet hundreds of researchers attending our AI Virtual Cells and Instruments: A New Era in Drug Discovery and Development workshop at NeurIPS 2025.

entry.title: Digital Twinning
entry.content: A piece in Harvard Gazette on digital twins, cellular chatbots, and building digital twins at a cellular scale.
entry.summary: A piece in Harvard Gazette on digital twins, cellular chatbots, and building digital twins at a cellular scale.

entry.title: CUREBench
entry.content: Excited to see 1,622 researchers from around the world entering our CUREBench Challenge with 398 participating teams that made 3,383 submissions to the competition and submitted 8,457,500+ AI reasoning traces for therapeutics. Join us at the Award Ceremony at NeurIPS.
entry.summary: Excited to see 1,622 researchers from around the world entering our CUREBench Challenge with 398 participating teams that made 3,383 submissions to the competition and submitted 8,457,500+ AI reasoning traces for therapeutics. Join us at the Award Ceremony at NeurIPS.

entry.title: AI For Science at NeurIPS
entry.content: Join us and hundreds of other scientists at the 6th AI for Science workshop at NeurIPS.
entry.summary: Join us and hundreds of other scientists at the 6th AI for Science workshop at NeurIPS.

entry.title: Protein Structure Tokenization
entry.content: New preprint introducing GeoBPE - Protein structure tokenization via geometric byte pair encoding.
entry.summary: New preprint introducing GeoBPE - Protein structure tokenization via geometric byte pair encoding.

entry.title: Generative AI Model for Spatial Biology

link.title: Generative AI Model for Spatial Biology

entry.content: New preprint introducing CONCERT, a niche-aware generative model that predicts perturbation effects across spatial tissue contexts.
entry.summary: New preprint introducing CONCERT, a niche-aware generative model that predicts perturbation effects across spatial tissue contexts.

entry.title: AI Cell Models
entry.content: A piece in Science explores how AI cell models could transform biomedicine (if they work as promised) and highlights ToolUniverse. ToolUniverse lets AI co-scientists test, analyze, and build on AI cell models.
entry.summary: A piece in Science explores how AI cell models could transform biomedicine (if they work as promised) and highlights ToolUniverse. ToolUniverse lets AI co-scientists test, analyze, and build on AI cell models.
